DisputeItemMerchantAlert.name: DisputeItemMerchantAlert
DisputeItemMerchantAlert.description: Represents the alert sent by the card issuer to the merchant. The alert occurs through a chargeback prevention vendor like Ethoca Merchant Alerts™ for a transaction that’s being disputed.

AlertDeliveryStatus.description: Specifies the delivery status of the alert associated with an individual transaction in a batch of disputed transactions.

AlertDlvrStatusDescription.description: The description of the delivery status of the alert.

AlertIdentifier.description: A unique identifier assigned to a merchant alert related to the transaction that's being disputed. The alert identifier is generated by a chargeback prevention system like Ethoca.

DisputeItemId.description: The Dispute Item associated with the merchant alert.

DisputedTrxnBatchIdentifier.description: An unique identifier assigned to the request made by the issuer for submitting a group of disputed transactions. Each group of disputed transactions is called a batch. The batch identifier is generated by a chargeback prevention system like Ethoca.

DisputedTrxnBatchStatus.description: Specifies the status of the batch of disputed transactions that includes this transaction.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Outcome.description: Specifies the outcome of the alert selected by the merchant.

OutcomeDescription.description: The description of the alert outcome.

OutcomeUpdateDateTime.description: The date and time when the merchant last updated the alert outcome of the transaction that's being disputed. The timestamp is represented in the ISO 8601 format.

RefundStatus.description: Specifies the status of the refund issued by the merchant in response to the customer's dispute alert.

Source.description: Specifies the source of the merchant alert.

Type.description: Specifies the type of alert associated with the transaction that's being disputed.
